snippet.title: Guard Duty Flashlight | Teaser #2
snippet.description:
A quick demonstration of the new Flashlight melee weapon and some of its functions.
Demonstration environment is a work in progress portion of the Hazard Course. 


**Everything in this video is a heavy work in progress, missing assets, and subject to change**

Official Discussions: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/

FAQ: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/0/3598968030045553000/

Available Positions: https://steamcommunity.com/app/311810/discussions/1/4032472803481057132/

Community Discord: https://discord.gg/YjyEgeJ
